<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 3: Name your Village](/Rules.aspx?ID=1834)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 543</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Each settlement needs a name. Some leaders name settlements after themselves or their families, but the name can be anything suitable for the campaign and agreeable to the PCs.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
